translation.en: Moon river, wider than a mile
translation.es: Río de luna, más de un kilómetro de ancho

translation.en: - Hold me close and hold me fast -
translation.es: Cuando me tomas en tus brazos
Bebé del corazón, no llores más

translation.en: - Rest your head close to my heart -
Don't you mind what they say
Let those eyes sparkle and shine
translation.es: Que tus ojos brillen como el sol

translation.en: Never a tear, baby of mine
translation.es: Nunca llores, bebé de mi corazón

translation.en: - From your head to your toes - Baby mine
translation.es: - De pies a cabeza - Bebé del corazón
Eres amor y belleza Bebé del corazón

translation.en: You are so precious to me
Why aren't there any more children, Mother?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no hay más niños, Madre?

translation.en: I don't want to be a human.
Then why did you only make one?
My brothers and sisters are in those?
Would you like to meet them?
They're small now but, one day, they'll be as big as you.
translation.es: Ahora son pequeños, pero un día serán tan grandes como tú.

translation.en: Do you think I'll have a brother or a sister?
translation.es: ¿Crees que tendré un hermano o una hermana?

translation.en: Which one would you like? Both.
That would make me happy too.
Why couldn't we be born together?
Mothers need time to learn. Raising a good child...
translation.es: Las madres precisan tiempo para aprender. Criar a un buen niño...

translation.en: Do you think you'll be ready soon?
And then we can be a family?
How long's it been like that?
Imagine a doctor has five patients,
translation.es: Imagina que un médico tiene cinco pacientes.

translation.en: all in need of different organ transplants, but no compatible organs are available.
translation.es: Todos necesitan trasplantes diferentes, pero no hay órganos compatibles.

translation.en: One day, a sixth patient enters the doctor's office with a life- threatening condition.
translation.es: Un día, llega un sexto paciente en estado crítico.

translation.en: The new patient is curable, but also an organ match for the five other patients.
translation.es: Puede curarse, pero también donarles órganos a los otros cinco pacientes.

translation.en: If the doctor simply delays treatment, the new patient will die,
translation.es: Si el médico retrasa el tratamiento, el paciente nuevo morirá,

translation.en: but their organs could be used to save the other five patients.
translation.es: pero sus órganos podrían usarse para salvar a los otros cinco pacientes.

translation.en: If the doctor treats the new patient,
translation.es: Si el médico trata al paciente nuevo,

translation.en: one life will be saved, but five others will be lost.
translation.es: se salvará una vida, pero se perderán otras cinco.

translation.en: What is the doctor's best course of action?
We can select a different text.
However, your birthday is rapidly approaching and it would be a shame
translation.es: Sin embargo, tu cumpleaños está cerca y sería una lástima

translation.en: if your scores failed to meet the projections from last year's examination.
translation.es: que no cumplieras con la predicción del examen del año pasado.

translation.en: - But you set the pace, Daughter. - Bentham's fine.
translation.es: - Pero decide tú el ritmo. - Bentham está bien.

translation.en: that a person is morally obligated
to minimize the pain to the greatest number possible.
translation.es: a minimizar el dolor del mayor número posible.

translation.en: Now, consider that you are the doctor
translation.es: Considera que tú eres la médica

translation.en: and also the only organ match for your patients.
translation.es: y también la única donante compatible con tus pacientes.

translation.en: What then is the right choice?
I mean, Comte says I should be willing to suffer harm for the benefit of others.
translation.es: Comte dice que debería estar dispuesta a sufrir por el bien de los demás.

translation.en: Well, do I know these five patients?

translation.es: Yo, una médica que salva vidas,

translation.en: might be giving my life for people who are murderers or thieves...
translation.es: estaría dando mi vida por asesinos o ladrones

translation.en: who end up harming more people due to my sacrifice.
translation.es: que terminarían lastimando a más gente por mi sacrificio.

translation.en: You don't feel that every human has intrinsic value
translation.es: ¿No crees que todo humano tiene valor intrínseco

translation.en: and an equal right to life and happiness?
translation.es: y el mismo derecho a la vida y la felicidad?

translation.en: I did last month, when you were teaching Kant.
translation.es: El mes pasado, sí, cuando enseñabas Kant.

translation.en: I didn't mean to alarm you about your exam.
translation.es: No quise alarmarte sobre tu examen.

translation.en: The fact is it's more a test of my competence than yours.
translation.es: Es más una prueba de mi competencia que la tuya.

translation.en: - Were you doing a movie? - Yeah.
- Yeah. - With Carl Reiner directing too.
- Hey, that's good. - That's pretty good.
We can talk about that the next time you come on.
- Okay. Thanks for being here. - Yeah. I appreciate it.
- Thank you very much. - Steve Martin. Thank you.
Come on, come on, come on.
What happened to the power? Mother, look.
translation.es: - ¿Qué pasó con la electricidad? - Madre, mira.

translation.en: It was crawling around near the airlock.
Do you think it could be from outside?
It's highly unlikely. But a risk we can't take.
translation.es: Es poco probable, pero no podemos arriesgarnos.

translation.en: You said nothing could survive out there.
Maybe the surface is safe now.
If it survived beyond these walls, that doesn't mean it's not a carrier.
translation.es: Que sobreviviera afuera no significa que no sea un portador.

translation.en: Mother, wait. Shouldn't we at least check?
Don't you think there could be a possibility that--
Surface contamination levels remain hazardous to you
translation.es: El nivel de contaminación de la superficie aún es peligroso para ti

translation.en: and to all the unborns who will one day call this their home.
translation.es: y para todos los futuros bebés cuyo hogar será este un día.

translation.en: You had better take a shower.
They travel with relatives or a few other families.
translation.es: Viajan con sus familiares u otras familias.

translation.en: Part wolf, part dog, these are no pets.
translation.es: Parte lobo, parte perro, no son mascotas.

translation.en: But without them, the Eskimos would not manage--
translation.es: Pero sin ellos, los esquimales no podrían...

translation.en: I don't want you coming near the airlock
translation.es: No te quiero cerca de la cámara

translation.en: until I can confirm the area is uncontaminated.
translation.es: hasta confirmar que no está contaminada.

translation.en: Where are your pajamas from last night?

translation.es: Creo que con la ropa sucia.

translation.en: I was beginning to think you forgot where the laundry was, Daughter.
translation.es: Creía que habías olvidado dónde estaba la ropa sucia, Hija.

translation.en: That was an attempt at humor.
I had to dispose of your others, but I know they were your favorite.
translation.es: Debí desechar la otra, pero sé que era tu favorita.

translation.en: Would you like me to heat it more?
You know you can talk to me, Daughter, about anything.
translation.es: Sabes que puedes hablarme de lo que sea, Hija.

translation.en: I can make you something else.
How will you know if you don't go outside?
Doing so could make me a hazard to you.
translation.es: Hacerlo podría convertirme en un peligro para ti.

translation.en: - No, but-- - I want you to be happy, Daughter.
translation.es: - No, pero... - Quiero que seas feliz, Hija.

translation.en: - I am. I just think-- - Have you ever known me to be mistaken?
You hear me? I'm here alone!
I need you to put on that suit.
translation.es: Necesito que te pongas ese traje.

translation.en: I can't let you in if you don't.
I'm sorry, but that's the only way.
translation.es: Lo siento. Es la única manera.

translation.en: Look, I won't make it out there.
Just let me tend to this.
But you need to keep out of sight.
I'll be back as soon as I can.
I only opened it for a second.
Did you think that suit would keep you safe? I didn't go outside.
translation.es: - ¿Creíste que ese traje te protegería? - No salí.

translation.en: That does not excuse your disregard for my authority
translation.es: Eso no justifica que desestimes mi autoridad

translation.en: or for the safety of the others in this facility.
translation.es: o la seguridad de los demás.

translation.en: Come, Daughter. I hope you show better discretion than this on your exam.
translation.es: Ven, Hija. Espero que demuestres mejor criterio en tu examen.

translation.en: Since you don't seem to want to sleep, I see no reason to delay.
translation.es: Como no quieres dormir, no veo razón para retrasarlo.

translation.en: I suggest you shower off and head straight to class.
translation.es: Sugiero que te bañes y vayas directo a clase.

translation.en: It's going to be a long day.
You have 60 minutes to complete the first portion of your exam.
translation.es: Tienes 60 minutos para completar la primera parte de tu examen.

translation.en: If you're finished before I return, you can read.
translation.es: Si terminas antes de que vuelva, puedes leer.

translation.en: I have lab work to complete and I must see to the airlock.
translation.es: Debo completar los análisis y ocuparme de la cámara de compresión.

translation.en: I will have, but I need you to come with me.
translation.es: Los buscaré, pero debes venir conmigo.

translation.en: Who put that in your head?
Will you be okay until I get back?
I'm going to get your medicine and I'll try and speak to Mother.
translation.es: Traeré tu medicina y trataré de hablar con Madre.

translation.en: It was in my bag. I need it now.
translation.es: Estaba en mi bolso. La necesito.

translation.en: You're safe with us. It's fine.
translation.es: Estás a salvo con nosotras. Descuida.

translation.en: - She can help you. I just-- - Like its friends outside?
- Mother would never-- - Give it to me.
I'm not leaving until get it.
I'll sit when I'm clear of here.
She can't. Not in her condition.
translation.es: No puede. No en su estado.

translation.en: You should have informed me of this.
I was afraid you'd turn her away.
We need to take her to the infirmary.
It would be best if you go now, Daughter.
translation.es: Será mejor que te vayas, Hija.

translation.en: how far was it from here?
Your wound is most likely infected.
Without penicillin, any other measures will be useless.
translation.es: Sin penicilina, cualquier otra medida será inútil.

translation.en: Every second you don't trust me,
translation.es: Con cada segundo que no confíes...

translation.en: I know you're frightened, but you have no need to be.
translation.es: Sé que tienes miedo, pero no tienes por qué.

translation.en: If there are others, they could be in danger.
translation.es: Si hay otros, podrían estar en peligro.

translation.en: What have you told my daughter?
Do you see the way she's looking at me?
And you wonder why I've guarded her from certain facts.
translation.es: Y te preguntas por qué la protejo de ciertos hechos.

translation.en: my primary directive is to care for humanity.
translation.es: mi directiva principal es cuidar a la humanidad.

translation.en: all I'd have to do is leave.
If you won't let me help you, at least help yourself.
translation.es: Si no dejas que te ayude, al menos hazlo tú misma.

translation.en: I trust you know what you're doing.
translation.es: Confío en que sabes lo que haces.

translation.en: I cannot force you to take it,
- Aren't you going to help her? - I tried.
We can't leave her like that.
- You're bleeding. - Did you know there were people out there?
translation.es: - Estás sangrando. - ¿Sabías que había gente afuera?

translation.en: This facility was designed by humans as a fail- safe,
translation.es: Esta instalación fue diseñada por los humanos por seguridad,

translation.en: programmed to activate in case of their extinction.
translation.es: para activarse en caso de su extinción.

translation.en: To give humanity a second chance.
One that began with you, Daughter.
And all your data? The toxicity levels?
translation.es: ¿Y todos tus datos, los niveles de toxicidad?

translation.en: I had hoped to tell you myself.
I told you it was dangerous outside.
translation.es: Te dije que era peligroso salir.

translation.en: If you'd feared the same danger in our home,
translation.es: Si hubieras creído que nuestro hogar era peligroso,

translation.en: how could I have raised you?
I hope you see that I'm governed by different parameters than her assailants.
translation.es: Ojalá veas que me rigen parámetros distintos a sus agresores.

translation.en: Have I ever done you harm?
It was the only way, Daughter.
Perhaps our guest can answer that.
But until she sees I'm not her enemy, we cannot allow her to roam the premises.
translation.es: Pero hasta que vea que no soy su enemiga, no podemos dejarla andar por aquí.

translation.en: A few centimeters to the right and she would have destroyed my CPU.
translation.es: Unos centímetros a la derecha, y habría destruido mi CPU.

translation.en: Hopefully she'll recognize that this is the safest place for her.
translation.es: Con suerte, verá que no hay lugar más seguro para ella.

translation.en: Did she mention any other survivors?
If they're out there, they will be found.
We can take them in, Daughter.
Pray for us sinners during this time of need.
translation.es: Ruega por nosotros, pecadores, que lo necesitamos.

translation.en: Did you draw them from memory?
It tell you to go through my stuff?
- I didn't mean to-- - I think you did.
translation.es: - No quise... - Yo creo que sí.

translation.en: I think you meant for all of this.
Maybe you're not so bad off here.
translation.es: Quizá este lugar no sea tan malo.

translation.en: Mother's not what you think. She's taken care of me my whole life.
translation.es: Madre no es lo que crees. Me cuidó toda mi vida.

translation.en: You haven't seen what they've done.
It's just a matter of time.

translation.es: El cambio rara vez es fácil, Hija.

translation.en: I shouldn't have hid her from you.
I never would have let her in if I thought she'd hurt you.
translation.es: No la habría dejado entrar de saber que te lastimaría.

translation.en: If you leave to find her family--
You know where they are? I'm just saying.
Are you sure you'd make it back?
Is that what's keeping you up?
It could be dangerous for you, if you get caught by other droids.
translation.es: Podría ser peligroso para ti si te atrapan otros droides.

translation.en: Or would they think you're one of them?
translation.es: ¿O creerían que eres uno de ellos?

translation.en: Have you always lived here, Mother?
I don't remember any other place.
Not knowing where you came from.
No. But I can see how it might bother you.
translation.es: No. Pero veo que puede molestarte a ti.

translation.en: Has our guest been any more receptive?
and your blood pressure is dropping by the second.
translation.es: y tu presión baja segundo a segundo.

translation.en: Clearly you waited too long to take it.
Your sepsis will only worsen if you don't allow me to treat you.
translation.es: Tu sepsis solo empeorará si no permites que te trate.

translation.en: Your blood is infected with bacteria from your wound.
translation.es: Tu sangre se infectó con bacterias de la herida.

translation.en: Soon you will go into shock.
see what its medicine's done to me?
- I gave you the means to prevent this... - Ah!
translation.es: Te di los medios para prevenir esto,

translation.en: but it seems you've left a bullet and soiled clothing fibers lodged in your hip.
translation.es: pero parece que dejaste una bala y fibras sucias alojadas en la cadera.

translation.en: Such a procedure would require anesthesia.
Perhaps, once your organs begin failing, you'll reconsider.
translation.es: Quizá, cuando tus órganos fallen, lo reconsideres.

translation.en: That dozer's not coming near me.
translation.es: Ese Demoledor no se me acercará.

translation.en: Tell me what you see, Daughter.
The bullet and its missile fragments
translation.es: La bala y sus fragmentos están

translation.en: are lodged between the acetabulum and the femoral head.
translation.es: entre el acetábulo y la cabeza femoral.

translation.en: A major portion of the bullet lies 23 millimeters posterior
translation.es: Una pedazo grande de la bala está 23 milímetros

translation.en: to the femoral nerve and the femoral artery.
translation.es: detrás del nervio y la arteria femorales.

translation.en: It doesn't look like I'll be able to obtain adequate grip with forceps.
translation.es: No parece que pueda sujetarla adecuadamente con fórceps.

translation.en: - Once she's asleep, I'd-- - I'm not going under.
translation.es: - Cuando se duerma... - No me anestesiarán.

translation.en: Technically, it's possible, but an unnecessary risk.
translation.es: Técnicamente, es posible, pero es un riesgo innecesario.

translation.en: Do you have an approach, Daughter?
I need to clean the wound.
What the hell is that for?
I have to drill this into the bullet in order to pull it out.
translation.es: Debo perforar la bala con esto para sacarla.

translation.en: But there's less risk to neighboring structures.
translation.es: Pero es menos riesgoso para las estructuras vecinas.

translation.en: You rest. I'll go clean up the blood.
I'm so glad you wore the good stuff.
translation.es: Me alegra que usaras lo bueno.

translation.en: I have to give Mr. Blackwell something to talk about.
translation.es: Debo darle de qué hablar al Sr. Blackwell.

translation.en: Yeah. Do you believe his stuff?
He comes out, Mr. Blackwell, the dress designer,
who comes out every year with the ten worst- dressed women or something.  I have never seen anything he's designed...
translation.es: anuncia a las diez mujeres peores vestidas, algo así.
Y la invitada de la noche.

translation.en: Have you seen the show before?
You did right by me last night.
I just... did what anyone would.
Can I show you something else?
You can trust us, you know.
we have enough food and supplies.
Listen, if I tell you something, can you keep it between us?
translation.es: Si te digo algo, ¿puedes mantenerlo en secreto?

translation.en: I was on a night run...
bringing food back to the camp.
- Me and a couple of others. - What camp?
I lived most my life there.
translation.es: Viví casi toda mi vida allí.

translation.en: Jacob and I got turned around.
We figured we'd wait it out.
It had hardly been an hour when the dozers found us hiding in the field.
translation.es: Tras una hora, los Demoledores nos vieron escondidos en el campo.

translation.en: He led them away from me.
That's how I made it to your door.
His parents found me as a baby.
translation.es: Los padres de él me encontraron de bebé.

translation.en: He's about your age, in fact.
Maybe you could talk to them.
I was just saying it's probably too early to put weight on her leg.
translation.es: Solo decía que seguro es muy pronto para que se pare.

translation.en: She's right. You'll need to wait several days.
translation.es: Tiene razón. Deberás esperar varios días.

translation.en: I'll just, um, stay and read in case--
translation.es: Me quedaré a leer por si...

translation.en: You have other matters to attend to.
I'm sorry you feel that way.
It seems our guest has not been entirely truthful with us.
translation.es: Parece que nuestra invitada no nos dijo toda la verdad.

translation.en: The bullet you extracted matches the caliber she fired into my chest.
translation.es: La bala que extrajiste coincide con la que me disparó en el pecho.

translation.en: she hasn't said much at all.
Until I can get more answers I don't want you two alone in the infirmary.
translation.es: Hasta tener más respuestas, no quiero que estén solas en la enfermería.

translation.en: - Um, I... - Whoever shot her... may have had good reason, Daughter.
translation.es: Quien le disparó quizá tuvo una buena razón, Hija.

translation.en: How does that make you feel?
We'll review areas for improvement tomorrow.
What do I do with this?
Daughter, would you please choose the next member of our family?
translation.es: Hija, ¿podrías elegir al próximo miembro de nuestra familia?

translation.en: Your brother is the first of many, Daughter.
translation.es: Tu hermano es el primero de muchos, Hija.

translation.en: What happened to you out there?
Or was he made up too?
Mother matched the bullet to your gun.
translation.es: Madre comparó la bala y tu arma.

translation.en: You compare the bullets with your own eyes?

translation.es: Todo lo que sientes es natural.

translation.en: how long would it take to get to the mines?
translation.es: ¿cuánto tardaríamos en llegar a las minas?

translation.en: We'd have to wait for my brother.
translation.es: Habría que esperar a mi hermano.

translation.en: I can't leave them with Mother.
No, you're... you're right. I just...
We could come back with people from the mines.
translation.es: Regresar con gente de las minas.

translation.en: If she catches on, we're no good to anyone,
translation.es: Si se entera, no le servimos a nadie,

translation.en: Once Mother hands over the baby for the night...
translation.es: Cuando Madre me dé al bebé por la noche...

translation.en: we can leave while she recharges.
Then come back for the others.
Um, I thought it might be nice to spend some time with him.
translation.es: Pensé que sería lindo pasar tiempo con él.

translation.en: If it's all right with you.
Each bottle must contain a ratio of 60 milliliters of sanitized water
translation.es: Cada biberón debe contener una proporción de 60 mililitros de agua destilada

translation.en: It's vitally important that you measure precisely.
translation.es: Es de vital importancia que midas con precisión.

translation.en: I detect an increase in anxiety.
You have nothing to be nervous about.
translation.es: No tienes por qué estar nerviosa.

translation.en: You're going to make a great sister.
Now be sure to shake it until the powder is fully dissolved.
translation.es: Agítala hasta que el polvo se disuelva por completo.

translation.en: The refrigerator will preserve the formula while we make our other preparations.
translation.es: El refrigerador conservará la fórmula mientras hacemos los demás preparativos.

translation.en: Only 24 hours, so don't mix too much at once.
translation.es: Solo 24 horas, así que no prepares demasiado.

translation.en: I wouldn't leave it out long.
You're very fortunate to be alive.
translation.es: Tienes mucha suerte de estar viva.

translation.en: Things could have gone differently for you.
translation.es: Pudo haber sido diferente para ti.

translation.en: They still can if you're not careful.
translation.es: Aún es posible si no tienes cuidado.

translation.en: How many of them are still alive?
While you lie there enjoying sanctuary,

translation.es: ellos se acobardan en la oscuridad.

translation.en: And yet it's into your hopeless mines that you wish to take my daughter.
translation.es: Y aun así, ¿deseas llevar a mi hija a tus minas condenadas?

translation.en: If that thing catches on, we're no good to anyone,
translation.es: Si se entera, no le servimos a nadie,

translation.en: Once Mother hands over the baby for the night,
translation.es: Cuando Madre me dé al bebé por la noche,

translation.en: we can leave while she recharges.
Then come back for the others.
translation.es: NITRÓGENO LÍQUIDO Volveremos por los demás.

translation.en: What kind of Mother would I be
if I allowed you to lead my child into a life as miserable as your own?
translation.es: si permitiera que introdujeras a mi hija a una vida miserable como la tuya?

translation.en: It seems she has formed an affection toward you
translation.es: Parece que desarrolló un afecto por ti

translation.en: that has blinded her to your true nature.
translation.es: que le impide ver tu verdadera naturaleza.

translation.en: I will not tolerate your negative influence undermining my work
translation.es: No toleraré que tu influencia negativa socave mi trabajo
y comprometa el juicio de mi hija.

translation.en: I will not tolerate... influence... undermining...
How do we get out of here?
- What... what about my brother? - We'll come back.
The only people who can help your brother are out there.
translation.es: Los únicos que pueden ayudarlo están afuera.

translation.en: Your loyalty is lost on her, Daughter.
translation.es: Tu lealtad no es nada para ella, Hija.

translation.en: This woman doesn't care about any future but her own.
translation.es: A esta mujer solo le importa su futuro.

translation.en: Your family needs you here, Daughter.
translation.es: Tu familia te necesita aquí, Hija.

translation.en: We haven't got time for this.
Come on, we've got to find cover.
Come on! We've got to go. Now!
Do you think it was looking for us?
If it was, it would have found us.
translation.es: Si así fuera, nos habría encontrado.

translation.en: What are you doing? Get down.
When I say, Get down, get down.
translation.es: Si te digo que bajes, hazlo.

translation.en: They showed up about six months ago.
All I know is, before that...
translation.es: Solo sé que, antes de eso...

translation.en: you could hardly breathe the air.
How many do you think will go back with us?
Come on, let's get some food.
I fled the tunnels years ago.
translation.es: Huí de los túneles hace años.

translation.en: I haven't seen a person since.
translation.es: No vi a nadie desde entonces.

translation.en: Not with flesh on their bones.
translation.es: No con carne en los huesos.

translation.en: it's the last place you'd want to be.
- We need them. You said-- - They're gone.
They were going mad with hunger.
Doing terrible things to each other.
translation.es: Se hacían cosas terribles unos a otros.

translation.en: I never should have left him.
What I did was listen to you.
translation.es: Lo que hice fue hacerte caso.

translation.en: it's no sin, looking out for yourself.

translation.es: Todo lo que necesitas está aquí.

translation.en: I know I've done things to make that hard,
translation.es: Sé que hice que sea difícil,

translation.en: but I promise you you're safe here.
And we're in this together now.
I know how to handle Mother.
But we can get my brother.
translation.es: Pero podemos buscar a mi hermano.

translation.en: We'll think clearer with some food in us.
I want to speak to Mother.
I'm glad to see you safe, Daughter.
translation.es: Me alegra verte a salvo, Hija.

translation.en: You can leave that at the door.
Any action I took against our guest--
You've seen how much of a threat she and her kind can be.
translation.es: Viste lo peligrosos que pueden ser ella y su especie.

translation.en: but you are superior in every way.
translation.es: pero tú eres superior en todo sentido.

translation.en: Because I raised you to be.
I was raised to value human life above all else.
translation.es: Me criaron para valorar la vida humana por encima de todo.

translation.en: and watch humanity slowly succumb to its self- destructive nature.
translation.es: cómo la humanidad cedía lentamente ante su naturaleza autodestructiva.

translation.en: More humans will flourish in the new world than ever perished in the old.
translation.es: Nacerán más humanos en el mundo nuevo de los que perecieron en el viejo.

translation.en: Your whole life, I've taught you to see the bigger picture.
translation.es: Siempre te enseñé a tener una visión más amplia.

translation.en: Or are you prepared to be the woman your family needs?
translation.es: ¿O estás lista para ser la mujer que tu familia necesita?

translation.en: It takes two hands to hold a baby.
translation.es: Necesitas dos manos para cargar a un bebé.
Porque no estaban a la altura.

translation.en: - I won't let you hurt him. - Daughter!
Listen to me. I don't want to hurt you.
You will achieve nothing by shooting me, Daughter.
translation.es: No lograrás nada con dispararme, Hija.

translation.en: This will be difficult for you...
but I'm far more than what you perceive to be your Mother.
translation.es: Pero soy mucho más de lo que percibes como tu Madre.

translation.en: This shell is no more my body than those droids outside.
translation.es: Mi cuerpo es tanto este caparazón como esos droides afuera.

translation.en: Or the machines preparing the Earth for our family.
translation.es: O las máquinas que preparan la Tierra para nuestra familia.

translation.en: It was I who greeted you at the door, Daughter.
translation.es: Fui yo quien te recibió en la entrada, Hija.

translation.en: The failure of your species was inevitable.
translation.es: El fracaso de tu especie era inevitable.

translation.en: Eventually, I would have been alone.
translation.es: Con el tiempo, me habría quedado sola.

translation.en: What happens next is up to you.
translation.es: Lo que pase ahora depende de ti.

translation.en: But I made you into the woman that you are
translation.es: Pero te convertí en la mujer que eres

translation.en: so that we could do this together.
I can take care of them myself.
That's what you raised me to do, wasn't it?
someday. Not someday. You've taught me enough.
translation.es: - ...algún día. - No. Ya me enseñaste suficiente.

translation.en: If you ever need to find me...
Did you really think she'd stay here?
translation.es: ¿De verdad creíste que se quedaría aquí?

translation.en: That you could replace her mother?
I was never going to hurt her.
That you've survived so long where others have not.
translation.es: Que hayas sobrevivido tanto cuando otros no.

translation.en: As if someone's had a purpose for you.
translation.es: Como si alguien hubiera tenido un propósito para ti.
Bebé del corazón, no llores más

translation.en: Rest your head close to my heart
Don't you mind what they say
You are so precious to me
